12px;">&nbsp; </div><div class="TFQHme "></div><div class="S3NLN"><div class="fontHeadlineSmall zSdcRe PiF0we">From the owner</div><div class="Q7eoI"><button class="SBD2Rc L6Bbsd" jslog="39446; track:click;metadata:WyIwYWhVS0V3akx4ZkxUMHRHSUF4V09xNVVDSFFfSkw3OFE1NDRDQ0dRb0hRIl0=" aria-label="See local posts" jsaction="pane.wfvdle348.local-post.expand; ptrdown:ripple.play; mousedown:ripple.play; keydown:ripple.play"><div class="jQnbnc LCTIRd LC9kbb"><div class="HYLSGb "><div class="QI7YL"></div><div class="VpMB0 ">WE TELL YOU ALL OUR SECRETS Stubborn clogs can turn your home into a battleground, causing slow drains, foul smells, and constant headaches. Imagine having to deal with water pooling in sinks, toilets, and showers – refusing to drain. Not to mention the constant frustration of dealing with recurring blockages that disrupt your daily routine and add unnecessary stress to your life. At Pacific Plumbing Team, we use state-of-the-art methods to ensure your plumbing is as pristine as when it was first installed. Hydro jetting stands out as a powerful, eco-friendly technique that effectively clears stubborn blockages and buildup within your pipes. The hydro jetting process starts with a comprehensive video camera inspection of your plumbing system. This critical step helps our technicians precisely identify the location and severity of any blockages. Following the inspection, we introduce a high-pressure hose with a specialized nozzle into the pipes. This nozzle is designed to handle pressures up to 4000 psi. Our skilled technicians control the water flow, which scours the pipe walls, removing all debris, including tree roots, mineral deposits, and built-up grease. Hydro jetting is so appealing with its combination of simplicity, efficiency, and safety.</div></div><div class="lqMB ">20 hours ago</div><div class="dsrqad"><a data-tel="tel:+13236452537" jslog="39447; track:click;metadata:WyIwYWhVS0V3akx4ZkxUMHRHSUF4V09xNVVDSFFfSkw3OFE1NDRDQ0dRb0hRIl0=" jsaction="pane.wfvdle348.localPost.telephone; keydown:pane.wfvdle348.localPost.telephone">Call now</a></div></div><span><div class="EvLOsc" style="background-image: url(&quot;https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/geougc/AF1QipOcG_Zewyd1WPUHc7gcZjkOOhST0qR0hbHKlcrm=h400-no&quot;);"></div></span></button></div></div><div class="AyRUI" aria-hidden="true" style="height: 16px;">&nbsp; margin-left: 16px;"><div class="bDIshd"><div class="y1EPLe"><div class="Py6Qke fontTitleSmall"><span>What about Plastic over copper?</span></div><span><span class="ABA1ab" role="presentation" style="background-image: url(&quot;https://maps.gstatic.com/tactile/placeqa/merchant_1x.png&quot;);"><img class="NIyFnf" src="https://maps.gstatic.com/tactile/placeqa/ic_verified_2x.png" alt=""></span></span><div class="l79Qmc fontBodyMedium "><span>Over time plastic can become brittle / flimsy. This can lead to early breakage or sagging in lines. Plastic has to be glued which takes time and is subject to deterioration. Copper lasts much longer and can be soldered and checked immediate …</span></div><div class="vHycab"><span class="HBP3of fontTitleSmall"></span><span class="taIgN fontBodySmall">5 years ago</span><br style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></div><div class="m6QErb QoaCgb XiKgde KoSBEe tLjsW " style="padding-right: 16px; in Los Angeles, CA 90036 When it comes to maintaining a clean and efficient plumbing system, one of the most effective methods is hydro jetting. For residents and businesses in Los Angeles, CA 90036, 24/7 Rooter Service offers professional hydro jetting services that ensure your main sewer line remains clear and free of obstructions. What is Hydro Jetting? Hydro jetting is a cutting-edge technique used to clean sewer lines by utilizing high-pressure water streams. This method effectively removes stubborn clogs, debris, and build-up, including grease, scale, and roots that can accumulate over time. Unlike traditional methods, hydro jetting thoroughly cleans the inside of the pipes, leaving them in optimal condition.
